com.servicediscovery
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  com.servicediscovery.Message

public class Message
extends java.lang.Object

Message Format of service Discovery Layer: OR is the unique identification of a particular service that this message is addressed to. This can be empty or null this is to identify the type of service this message is addressed to. This can be null or empty This is the property to match for the service to which this is addressed to. This can be null or empty This is the particular action desired from the service being addressed. This cannot be null in case the message does not have a trigger. This is the trigger that a service is sending. This cannot be null unless the actions field is filled. this is the source service id of the service that generated this message and can be used to address the service at a later time.

Author:
parth

generateMessage

public java.lang.String generateMessage()
This method parses the message object and generates the message to be put on the wire This method also checks if the message is valid for generation or not it will throw an exception is the message is not valid i.e. does not have a trigger or an action or has both.

Returns:

parseMessage

public static Message parseMessage(java.lang.String json)
This method is used to parse a given message from the reliable multicast layer and convert it to a Message object it is a complement of the generateMessage mesage which does the exact opposite

Parameters:
json -
Returns:
